aboutMeText: Developer working for 7 years in the market, specialized in modern applications with javascript and currently positioned as a full stack developer.
historyText: Graduated in graphic design in 2015, my <1>ambition to create</1> didn't stop there, I ended up finding myself as a <1>developer</1> in the midst of the job market and decided to specialize and today I can't imagine myself out of this world.
hobbiesText: Among my favorite <1>hobbies</1> to enjoy in my spare time I can definitely say they are listening to <1>music</1>, <1>illustrating</1> and reading <1>manga</1> !
